title: Here's What Shahid Kapoor Has To Say About Becoming A Dad
text:
facebook 431 SHARES 
Shahid Kapoor is a proud father to his beautiful baby girl, Misha. While it is evident that he is enjoying fatherhood, we haven't really heard about how life has changed for him since the birth of his daughter. In a recent interview with GQ , he said, "fatherhood is like taking a bath. It is cleansing. It's to love something so pure and so devoid of baggage that it feels like a new start." 
He also went on to say that the pregnancy wasn't planned. "It wasn't planned actually, but I think we were ready for it. I was impatient to get married and have a family." 
And, Shahid and Mira are not stopping at one! He also shared, "Mira, who is just 22, would prefer to have a second kid as well. She wants to flip the norm, get the kids to a certain age and then be free to do what she likes."
